name: GRG OIL AND GAS
overview:
From one member of staff to an entire team, GRG has the expertise and resources to meet your companies requirements. We have a specialist team of recruitment consultants whose primary focus is resourcing for the Oil and Gas industry. This makes us industry specialists and GRG offer not only peace of mind when outsourcing your recruitment needs but also integrity and commitment to all of our assignments regardless of the size or length of a project. A blend of cutting edge IT technology and highly trained Recruitment Consultants gives us the speed, accuracy and efficiency to differentiate from our competitors and deliver results.

Having achieved accreditation to IS0 9001:2000 you can be assured of a quality, cost effective solution to your recruitment needs. GRG Oil and Gas are also corporate member of the REC (Recruitment and Employment Confederation)

GLOBAL PRESENCE

With offices in London, Singapore, Dubai and Sydney our highly skilled team of recruitment consultants have both local knowledge and specialist experience in the Oil and Gas Sectors. See office locations. This also means that as a client you can speak to one of our consultants 24hrs a day 7 days a week as our offices span 3 separate timezones. Our state of the art IT system means that we have a real-time job-tracking and database system which is linked in London, Singapore,Dubai and Sydney making sure that you always receive the most up to date and factual information available on the market.

COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGE

We match clients with the very best personnel available on the market. We also do this with speed and accuracy realizing that is often of paramount importance to our clients to have personnel sourced as quickly as possible. By constantly networking our database and through the strategic global locations of GRG’s offices we are able to offer global recruitment solutions to the global oil and gas industry. We realize the success of your energy industry company depends on the quality of the people you hire…why hire GRG?. Our commitment is to always provide the very best people to fill our clients’ contract and staffing positions.
